name: PAINTED GLITCH
description:
Today I had my first experience of having an artwork on show in at an Arts Festival. I’m in Amsterdam and the festival is in NZ so it’s been extra special for me. 

The artwork I made for the festival is a glitched video loop so I’ve handpainted one of the stills to show you.

In this image a man is falling and breaking into a million pieces while others watch on. 
He gets caught though. I think trusting that we will get caught if we break into a million pieces is really important. Sometimes other people catch us. Sometimes we catch ourselves.

Personal daily art story
Number 17 #STOREEZ by Cat Brown/ Treasvre Trove
